channel.description: Recent content in scene on Syem Ishaque

item.title: Project 1: NLP web app development and deployment using FastAPI and Heroku
item.description: • Designed the process behind developing and deploying a ML NLP model using sentiments from user reviews. • Implemented a NLP model web app using python and FastAPI, which can analyze sentiments using texts as user input. • Deployed the model in GitHub using Heroku. • Trained a NLP model using python and pickle and develop a ML platform using FastAPI. • The model can predict user sentiments using reviews or texts as input.
